title: Hierarchical self-assembly of Au-nanoparticles into filaments: evolution and break
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27343-27353
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04100C, Paper

Matteo Tiberi, Francesca Baletto
We compare the assembly of individual Au nanoparticles in a vacuum and between two Au(111) surfaces via classical molecular dynamics on a timescale of 100 ns.
